optionGroup.prompt:
---------------------------------- Set Up the CA API Gateway Database ---------------------------------- At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you create or set up a connection to the CA API Gateway database. If a connection is not configured the CA API Gateway will use an embedded database and will run with reduced functionality.

optionGroup.description: CA API Gateway Policy Manager Administrative Account
optionGroup.prompt:
------------------------------------------------------ Set Up the CA API Gateway Policy Manager Administrator ------------------------------------------------------ At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you create the CA API Gateway Policy Manager administrative user account.

--------------------------------- Set Up the CA API Gateway Cluster --------------------------------- At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you set up the CA API Gateway cluster.

------------------------------------------- Set Up the CA API Gateway Failover Database ------------------------------------------- At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you create or set up a connection to the CA API Gateway failover database.
